entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 06 February 2023
